form.label: Session Playlog
form.description: Displays commands entered during each session as well as the raw logs from each session

search.query: sourcetype=kippojson command=* | table host | dedup host

sourcetype=kippojson host=$sensor$ [ search sourcetype=kippojson command=* | stats count by session | fields session ] | transaction session | iplocation prefix=iploc_ allfields=true src_ip | eval src_ip_Country = if(isnull(iploc_Country),"Unknown",iploc_Country) | stats earliest(_time) as Time, values(src_ip) AS "Attacker IP", values(src_ip_Country) AS "Attacker Country", values(host) as "Sensor", count(command) as msgcount by session | where msgcount > 0 | eval Time=strftime(Time,"%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S") | rename msgcount AS "Message Count" session AS "Session" | sort - Time

sourcetype=kippojson [ search sourcetype=kippojson command=* | stats count by session | fields session ] | transaction session | stats values(src_ip) as src_ip, count(command) as msgcount by session | where msgcount > 0 | fields - msgcount, session | dedup src_ip | sort + src_ip
sourcetype=kippojson [search sourcetype=kippojson command=* | table session | dedup session ] | transaction session | search src_ip = $ipaddress$ | table session | dedup session
sourcetype=kippojson session=$field2$ command=* | table command, timestamp | sort + timestamp | rename command AS "Command Entered" timestamp AS "Timestamp"
sourcetype=kippojson session=$field2$ | table _raw | sort + _time | rename _raw AS "Raw Logs"
